creator: help@xde.net
text:
Both the above tasks create a lowercase web-inf directory for web.xml instead of
upper case, even if the source contains an upper case WEB-INF.  

WEB-INF/lib and WEB-INF/classes seem unaffected.  

Also it appears WEB.XML becomes Web.xml, however the correct web.xml stays the
same case web.xml.

War task may be affected as well.

How do you now what are the contents of the jar or zip files ?
Are you checking with winzip or with jar tvf or unzip -l ?
winzip might give unaccurate results in terms of exact case of the 
files/directories in the archive.

Also attach a build snippet please.
creator: antoine@apache.org

text:
Sorry go ahead and close it - winzip has never failed before, but seems to fail now.

jar shows properly:

C:\data\Applications\setups\spellchecker\spell\noapplet>jar tvf xdespellchecker.
war |more
